name: Diablo Inspired Prototype (Untitled)
description:
Looking for feedback on this.

1 Class so far just wanted to get the bare bones out there, want to have at least 5

15 Skills available along with Attribute points.

3 Bosses only for now, plan on having at least 5 down the road

Random loot generation, Common, Magic and Unique items.

Status Effects such as Poison, Bleed, Stun, Frostbite, Burn are in the game so far. Would implement a bunch more as well.

There are some bugs that I know of for sure, some smaller than others but for the most part it is working I just want to see what people think of a game like this.
